title: Where is ITEM SETS?The ITEMSET IS PART OF THE GAMEPLAY AND STRATEGY FYI. OPEN SHOP CLICK RECOMMEND
body:
The ITEMSET IS PART OF THE GAMEPLAY AND STRATEGY FYI. OPEN SHOP CLICK RECOMMENDED AND ITEM SETS IS THERE DONT YOU DARE TAKE THIS OFF.

Add Item sets back in the cilent. I don't know who took it off but that's silly you did. It gives players like me more preparation for playing champions and adding/removing item builds/sets

replies.body:
>We've finally got a date for the return of the Item Set Creator Tool. We're now aiming to bring the feature (which lets you edit item sets from the client without using a third party tool) to the PBE with patch 7.10. Barring any problems, it will then come to live servers soon after. We'll update you in the patch notes if anything happens to delay the tool's release further.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/features/legacy-client-now-retired

Less than 5% of the community used Item Sets, so Riot has put the feature way on the back burner while they make the new client better.

Honestly since so few people use the feature it should never come back.
They're coming to PBE in Patch 7.10 :)
Even though item sets is gone, I still have them in my shop. Worst thing is they're outdated, so I always have to ignore them xD
From what I know they're going to eventually
